metadata.title: CVE-2019-12386 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Ampache through 3.9.1. A stored XSS exists inthe localplay.php LocalPlay "add instance" functionality. The injected codeis reflected in the instances menu. This vulnerability can be abused toforce an admin to create a new privileged user whose credentials are knownby the attacker.

criterions.comment: ampache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
